hints.content:
To find how many cherries $\goldE{\text{Zoe}}$ put on her ice cream, we start with the number of cherries $\blueE{\text{Ann}}$ put on her ice cream, and add $\maroonD{2\text{ cherries}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7df8fe751d452529031f39c7acc07b4a62f4e77d)

$\blueE{4} + \maroonD{2} = \goldE{\Box}$

Let's add to find how many cherries $\goldE{\text{Zoe}}$ put on her ice cream.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e535671b48e8cd2ab91193c05217e75d2975a18f)

$\blueE{4} + \maroonD{2} = \goldE{6}$

question.content:
Ann and Zoe love ice cream with cherries on top.  Ann put $4$ cherries on hers.  Ann had $2$ fewer cherries than Zoe.

**How many cherries did Zoe have?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] cherries
